server.facade

Class MovesFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.facade.MovesFacade

  • public class MovesFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the go between for the server moves handlers and the command classes. The server handlers call this class and this class creates command classes, executes the methods, and then returns the info.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovesFacade()

      Plays a 'Monopoly' card from your hand to monopolize the specified resource.

      Plays a 'Monument' card from your hand to give you a victory point.

      Offers a domestic trade to another player.
      GameState roadBuilding(RoadBuildingCardRequest request)
      Plays a 'Road Building' card from your hand to build two roads at the specified locations.
      GameState robPlayer(RobPlayerRequest request)
      Moves the robber, selecting the new robber position and player to rob.
      GameState rollNumber(RollNumberRequest request)
      Used to roll a number a the beginning of your turn.

      Plays a 'Year of Plenty' card from your hand to gain the two specified resources.
